form.label: Search Configurations for a Regular Expression
form.searchTemplate: | confgrep rex="$regex$" | sort file_path line_count | table line_text file_path line_count | `long_line_breaker(line_text)` | rename file_path as "Location" line_count as "Line Number" line_text as "Text Found"

row.html: This searches all of the Splunk .conf and .xml files for the regular expression that you specify.
